definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (God openeth; cf. Sab.n.pr.m. [[ינתחאל]] Hal:148, l);—in ´[[גֵּייִפ]] (Gafahl, Gai kai Fqaihl A LXXL Gai (I) efqahl), valley betw. Zebulun and Asher Jos 19:14, Jos 19:27 (P); prob. near Jêfât (Jotapata), and perhaps upper part of Wady ‘Abellîn, v. Buhl:Geogr.109, 223.
